app.models
Class AbstractModel

java.lang.Object
  app.models.AbstractModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
Place
public abstract class AbstractModel
extends java.lang.Object

Superclass for all models. Implements event handling with a propertyChangeSupport object. Makes it possible to add listeners to models as well as firing events from them. It also gives support for automatically incremented ids which can be used for keeping track of and identifying model instances during runtime.

firePropertyChange

public void firePropertyChange(java.lang.String propertyName,
                               java.lang.Object oldValue,
                               java.lang.Object newValue)
Function to trigger a property change event from the model. This function must be manually called whenever the model wishes to notify others of a change.

Parameters:
propertyName - a string to describe the name of the property name that was changed, should in most cases be equal to the name of the variable containing the property.
oldValue - the value of the property before it was changed
newValue - the value that property was changed to
